remarks: Reversal of scanning order inside of a quantification over a finite set of sequential integers.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Nov-2005.)
statement:
fzrevral $p |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( A. j e. ( M ... N ) ph <-> A. k e. ( ( K - N ) ... ( K - M ) ) [. ( K - k ) / j ]. ph ) ) $.
$d K j k $.
$d M j k $.
$d N j k $.
$d k ph $.
